histogram.name: LocalSearchService.BindIndexHasError
histogram.summary: Whether or not BindIndex calls to LocalSearchService have errors. It is reported once for every BindIndex call. Chrome OS only.

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.MetricsDailyEventInterval
histogram.summary: Reasons why local search daily metrics were reported. Chrome OS only.

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}AddOrUpdateLatency
histogram.summary: Time taken to add/update content to the index. It is reported once for every AddOrUpdate call. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}Backend
histogram.summary: Type of backend requested from the Local Search Service. It is reported once at the initialization of an Index. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}ClearIndexLatency
histogram.summary: Time taken to clear all content from the index. It is reported once for every ClearIndex call. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}DailySearch
histogram.summary: Number of times the local search service has been requested to perform a search on a device. Reported daily. The count is accumulated through the day, spanning reboots, and sent once the system clock indicates that a full day or more has passed since the last report. If the system is suspended or off for more than a day, the current count will be reported the next time the system boots, but the skipped days will not be reported. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}DeleteLatency
histogram.summary: Time taken to delete content from the index. It is reported once for every Delete call. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}NumberDocuments
LocalSearchService.{IndexId}NumberResults
histogram.summary: Number of results for each successful search. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}NumberSearchPerformedDone
histogram.summary: This is recorded each time a search is successfully performed using LocalSearchService. Always records true. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}ResponseStatus
histogram.summary: Search request response status for Cros Settings. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}SearchLatency
histogram.summary: Time taken to find search results. Only recorded if search response status is success, i.e. neither index nor query is empty. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}UpdateDocumentsLatency
histogram.summary: Time taken to update contents from the index. It is reported once for every UpdateDocuments call. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalStorage.AccessMetaDataUpdateAtShutdown
histogram.summary:
Emitted when a local StorageArea is shutdown and the access metadata for the associated StorageKey is updated. It's possible to update the access metadata when new data is written to the storage area instead, so this metric does not capture all access metadata updates.
Value is true if update succeeded and false if update failed.

histogram.name: LocalStorage.BrowserLocalStorageCachePurgedInKB
histogram.summary: Total size of the HTML5 LocalStorage browser-side cache purged in KB when memory pressure signal was triggered or cache size hit the limits.

histogram.name: LocalStorage.BrowserLocalStorageCacheSizeInKB
histogram.summary: Total size of the HTML5 LocalStorage databases in KB in the browser-side cache recorded each time a new database is opened in memory.

histogram.name: LocalStorage.DaysSinceLastModified400DaysGT
histogram.summary:
Emitted when the browsing context that loaded the related local storage controller shuts down. One entry is recorded per local storage area.
Number of days since a local storage area was modified (for values over 400 days).

histogram.name: LocalStorage.DaysSinceLastModified400DaysLTE
histogram.summary:
Emitted when the browsing context that loaded the related local storage controller shuts down. One entry is recorded per local storage area.
Number of days since a local storage area was modified (for values under 400 days).

histogram.name: LocalStorage.MojoSizeInKB
histogram.summary:
Size of the HTML5 LocalStorage DB in KB in the renderer-side cache using Mojo implementation.
Warning: Histogram expired between M95-M110. Data may be missing.

histogram.name: LocalStorage.MojoTimeToPrime
histogram.summary:
Time (in ms) to load HTML5 LocalStorage into the renderer-side cache using Mojo implementation.
Warning: Histogram expired between M95-M110. Data may be missing.

histogram.name: LocalStorage.MojoTimeToPrimeFor{LocalStorageSizes}
LocalStorage.OrphanStorageAreasOnStartupCount
histogram.summary:
Records the amount of orphan (nonce-bound buckets which will never be loaded) storage areas detected on LocalStorageImpl initialization (profile load). Recorded one minute after LocalStorageImpl initialization to ensure any restored tabs have loaded.
See crbug.com/353555346 for more info.

histogram.name: LocalStorage.RendererAreaCacheHit
histogram.summary:
The renderer side cache hit rate metrics for new HTML5 LocalStorage DB opened.
Warning: this histogram was expired from M78 to M92; data may be missing.

histogram.name: LocalStorage.StaleStorageAreasDeletedOnStartupCount
histogram.summary:
Records the amount of stale (400 days since last access or write) storage areas deleted on LocalStorageImpl initialization (profile load).
Emitted after successful attempt to delete stale storage areas.
See crbug.com/40281870 for more info.

histogram.name: LocalStorage.StaleStorageAreasDeletedOnStartupSuccess
histogram.summary:
Records the success of clearing stale (400 days since last access or write) storage areas on LocalStorageImpl initialization (profile load).
Emitted after attempt to delete stale storage areas occurs.
See crbug.com/40281870 for more info.
